tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Priya is a absolute genius and a naturally gifted dental artisan with unique and priceless achievements, this is not for any, but few, Dr Priya is a rough diamond forever and ever after. The approach is so natural and friendly with the courage and patience to work a way out to ease the dental complications of a patient is amazing with all the staff and the dental associates have got what it takes to address the health issues with ease. The dental clinic is up to high standards and have a very likeable atmosphere with utmost humility. I have a huge personal experience about dentistry from the UK and EU standards, and can vouch for Priya Dental Clinic matching the same UK and EU standards. Sincerely,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I randomly chanced upon Dr. Priya profile on Practo when I was looking for a doctor close to my place, after suffering from long-term toothache. She turned out to be extremely friendly. I liked the professionalism of the staff and the other doctors who treated me on my multiple sessions. I had a complicated root canal treatment for an upper molar and a deep filling for a decayed lower molar. The doctors did not rush through the treatment, as that could have aggravated the issue. In fact, I had minor issues with the alignment of the crown after the root canal, but the doctor went ahead and fixed that too. I would definitely recommend Dr. Priya, not just for her professionalism but also for the modern methods used in her clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
